meanings.definition: furthest back in position; farthest from the front
meanings.sent1: The hindmost car in the race crossed the finish line last.
meanings.sent2: The hindmost seat on the bus is usually near the rear exit.
meanings.sent3: The hindmost squirrel in the line kept getting distracted by acorns.
meanings.sent4: The hindmost star in the constellation seemed to twinkle the brightest.
meanings.sent5: The hindmost book on the shelf was covered in dust from neglect.

meanings.definition: last in a sequence or order
meanings.sent1: The hindmost slice of cake was saved for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent2: The hindmost page of the book contained the surprising plot twist.
meanings.sent3: The hindmost student in line was always the first to leave the classroom.
meanings.sent4: The hindmost domino in the row caused the whole line to fall.
meanings.sent5: The hindmost player in the game made the winning move.
